title: The MetroVapor Podcast - Episode 4 [Riddle Release]
description:
A true podcast that reveals some of the most mind blowing statistics, news, and reviews about electronic cigarettes and the industry.

Are you a tobacco smoker? Do you smoke cigarettes? Do you have a family member who smokes?

How about this...

Have you ever tried an electronic cigarette?

-or-

Are you having trouble deciding on one to buy?

Everything you need to know about electronic cigarettes, is right here in the MetroVapor Podcast.

===================================================================================

MetroVapor Podcast Produced By ElectronicCigaretteConsumerReviews.com

Episode: 4

Title: Big Tobacco Bets on Vapor

Length: 42 minutes & 31 seconds

Recorded: 08/26/2012
